creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: decorated with cut-card work on handles and body; domed cover removable
inscription:
Mark

- On the side opposite the handle are engraved arms with a scroll cartouche; probably the arms of Alyson.  On underside of base are engraved initials:  
        [A]
  [E] [*] [G]
markings:
Mark

Fully marked (britannia standard) on upper side of body.  Maker\'s mark and lion\'s head erased on bezel of cover.
text: The side handle on this chocolate pot allowed one to hold and pour the pot while mixing the chocolate beverage with a muddler.   The highly decorative "cut-card" mounts applied around the handle and spout are a typical attribute of the English style in this period.
title: Chocolate pot
